description:
THE GAME Hockey fans have been waiting for!

Hockey Nations 2010 is a full arcade simulation of the sport featuring 14 national teams from around the World.

Hockey Nations is the first full scale 6 on 6 Hockey game for the Palm Pre and Palm Pixi. 

GAME MODES
•	Go for Gold – can you win gold?
•	World League – play all other teams, see who comes out on top.
•	Exhibition – choose two teams and get started right away.
•	Shoot-out – one on one with the keeper.
•	Practice – spend some time learning the controls.

You control the action with the virtual direction pad that offers full 360 degree control as well as the 3 action buttons on the right-hand side of the screen.

You’re also in control of the settings for each game. The options allow you to have icing and offside rules either on or off. Additionally, for each game you decide the length of the game and the difficulty level.

FEATURES
•	Motion Captured Animations
•	Detailed 3D Graphics
•	Simple Controls
•	Go for Gold
•	World League
•	Shoot-out
•	13 Achievements to Collect
•	Overtime
•	Penalties
•	Line changes
